title: Trust in e-cigarette safety varies by worldview, source of messaging

title_detail.value: Trust in e-cigarette safety varies by worldview, source of messaging

summary: Public health messaging about the safety of e-cigarettes needs to account for the worldviews of the target audience, with different groups displaying varying levels of trust depending on the source of the message, according to a recent study.

summary_detail.value: Public health messaging about the safety of e-cigarettes needs to account for the worldviews of the target audience, with different groups displaying varying levels of trust depending on the source of the message, according to a recent study.
